text: aur ye ke tum log apne gunah apne rub se maaf karao phir osi ki taraf mutawajje raho, wo tum ko waqte muqarrar tak accha samaan (zindagi) dega aur har zyada amal karne wale ko zyada sawaab dega aur agar tum log eraaz karte rahe to mujh ko tumhare liye ek bade din ke azaab ka andesha hai tum ko Allah hee ke paas jana hai aur wo har shai par puri khudrath rakhta hai
